mapper.insert: insert into member( mem_id, mem_pwd, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_birth, mem_email ) values ( #{mem_id}, #{mem_pwd}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_birth}, #{mem_email} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where mem_id = #{id}
select B.* from like_list A , product B where A.pro_no = B.pro_no and A.mem_no = #{mem_no} and pro_sale = 'N'
select * from (select B.* , ROWNUM AS RN from like_list A , product B where A.pro_no = B.pro_no and A.mem_no = #{mem_no} and pro_sale = 'N') where RN BETWEEN #{startPage}+1 and #{endPage}
